About Me

darrell.kiely.jp@gmail.com

Let me tell you a little about myself...

I'm a career educator with a growing passion for information technologies and computer science. I love cafes, exploring nature, and good stories in all mediums. But these days, my main hobby is studying. I'm having a great time working on small projects to build my skills and knowledge.

I have built a number full-stack web applications with Python backends utilising frameworks like Flask and Django connected to SQLite and Postgres DB's. On the front end I've built fully responsive single-page apps utilising REACT.js, styled with CSS and SCSS. And I'm actively doing more!

WORK

Classroom Teacher

I developed courses and materials to align with the Victorian curriculum. I was in charge of senior high school courses in Economics, Business Management, and Accounting, with a little history and geography for the younger year levels.

English Language Teacher

I handled all kinds of classes, from groups of pre-school kids, people preparing for tests, to one-on-one lessons with directors and renowned scientists. They taught me a lot, and I'm sure I did the same for them.
